page_content: The page provides information on various types of taxes and tax-related services in the Canton of Zurich.
The page provides instructions for registering for eBill, a service for receiving bills directly in your E-Banking portal.
The page outlines the regulations and responsibilities for the collection and waiver of various types of taxes and penalties in the Canton of Zurich.
The page discusses the revision of the Parking Guidelines as part of the cantonal air program 1996.
The page discusses the rights and obligations of public employees in the Canton of Zurich, particularly concerning the exercise of public offices.
The page provides guidelines for registering a visit to the Center for Administrative Detention under Foreign Law (ZAA) in Zurich.
The page provides guidelines for notaries and land registry offices on their role in the collection of property taxes, in accordance with the revised tax law.
